Package gameEngine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    This class represents the 3 types of cards that can be given to a player after each turn or after capturing the last country of another player.
    Continent
    This class represents the continents in the game.
    Country
    This Country represents each country in the game.
    PhaseManager
    PhaseManager
    Player
    This class represents each player in the game.
    StartUpPhase
    This class takes care of the initialization part where it decides which countries are given to which player, how many armies should be given to each player and how many armies are placed in each country for that particular player.
    TurnManager  
    ValidateGraph
    This class scrapes the data from .map file and checks the graph for errors.
Author:
shiva
